"-- R3TR TOBJ V_T028Y_SEPAV (language: EN , source: E17 )

"-- R3TR VCLS VC_FIEB_RETURNS (language: DE , source: E17 )
  CALL METHOD lcl_wb=>create_logical_object "#EC *
    EXPORTING
      i_object   = 'VCLS'
      i_obj_name = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'
      i_devclass = 'FTE'
      i_langu    = 'D'
    EXCEPTIONS
      OTHERS     = 1.
  IF sy-subrc eq 0.

  DATA: lt_vcldir TYPE TABLE OF vcldir, ls_vcldir TYPE vcldir.

  CLEAR ls_vcldir.
  ls_vcldir-vclname    = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'.                           "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vcldir-changedate = sy-datum.                                    "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vcldir-author     = sy-uname.                                    "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vcldir-readkind   = 'T'.                                         "#EC NOTEXT
  APPEND ls_vcldir TO lt_vcldir.


  CALL METHOD lcl_wb=>create_table_entries "#EC *
    EXPORTING
      i_logical_object = 'X'
      i_tabname  = 'VCLDIR'
      it_entries = lt_vcldir.

  DATA: lt_vcldirt TYPE TABLE OF vcldirt, ls_vcldirt TYPE vcldirt.

  CLEAR ls_vcldirt.
  ls_vcldirt-spras   = 'D'.                                           "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vcldirt-vclname = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'.                             "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vcldirt-text    = 'Rckluferverarbeitung im Kontoauszug'.       "#EC NOTEXT
  APPEND ls_vcldirt TO lt_vcldirt.


  CALL METHOD lcl_wb=>create_table_entries "#EC *
    EXPORTING
      i_logical_object = 'X'
      i_tabname  = 'VCLDIRT'
      it_entries = lt_vcldirt.

  CLEAR lt_vcldirt[].

  CLEAR ls_vcldirt.
  ls_vcldirt-spras   = 'E'.                                           "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vcldirt-vclname = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'.                             "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vcldirt-text    = 'Returns Processing in the Bank Statement'.    "#EC NOTEXT
  APPEND ls_vcldirt TO lt_vcldirt.


  CALL METHOD lcl_wb=>create_table_entries "#EC *
    EXPORTING
      i_logical_object = 'X'
      i_tabname  = 'VCLDIRT'
      it_entries = lt_vcldirt.

  DATA: lt_vclstruc TYPE TABLE OF vclstruc, ls_vclstruc TYPE vclstruc.

  CLEAR ls_vclstruc.
  ls_vclstruc-vclname    = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'.                         "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruc-object     = 'V_T028X'.                                 "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruc-predobject = 'V_T028X'.                                 "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruc-objpos     = '01'.                                      "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruc-objlevel   = '01'.                                      "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruc-dependency = 'R'.                                       "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruc-startobj   = 'X'.                                       "#EC NOTEXT
  APPEND ls_vclstruc TO lt_vclstruc.

  CLEAR ls_vclstruc.
  ls_vclstruc-vclname    = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'.                         "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruc-object     = 'V_T028Y'.                                 "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruc-predobject = 'V_T028Y'.                                 "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruc-objpos     = '02'.                                      "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruc-objlevel   = '01'.                                      "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruc-dependency = 'R'.                                       "#EC NOTEXT
  APPEND ls_vclstruc TO lt_vclstruc.

  CLEAR ls_vclstruc.
  ls_vclstruc-vclname    = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'.                         "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruc-object     = 'V_T028Y_SEPA'.                            "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruc-predobject = 'V_T028Y'.                                 "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruc-objpos     = '04'.                                      "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruc-dependency = 'S'.                                       "#EC NOTEXT
  APPEND ls_vclstruc TO lt_vclstruc.

  CLEAR ls_vclstruc.
  ls_vclstruc-vclname    = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'.                         "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruc-object     = 'V_T028Z'.                                 "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruc-predobject = 'V_T028Y'.                                 "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruc-objpos     = '03'.                                      "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruc-objlevel   = '02'.                                      "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruc-dependency = 'S'.                                       "#EC NOTEXT
  APPEND ls_vclstruc TO lt_vclstruc.


  CALL METHOD lcl_wb=>create_table_entries "#EC *
    EXPORTING
      i_logical_object = 'X'
      i_tabname  = 'VCLSTRUC'
      it_entries = lt_vclstruc.

  DATA: lt_vclstruct TYPE TABLE OF vclstruct, ls_vclstruct TYPE vclstruct.

  CLEAR ls_vclstruct.
  ls_vclstruct-spras      = 'D'.                                      "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-vclname    = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'.                        "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-object     = 'V_T028X'.                                "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-objecttext = 'Interne Rcklufergrnde Externen zuweisen'. "#EC NOTEXT
  APPEND ls_vclstruct TO lt_vclstruct.

  CLEAR ls_vclstruct.
  ls_vclstruct-spras      = 'D'.                                      "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-vclname    = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'.                        "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-object     = 'V_T028Y'.                                "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-objecttext = 'Rckluferaktivitten'.                  "#EC NOTEXT
  APPEND ls_vclstruct TO lt_vclstruct.

  CLEAR ls_vclstruct.
  ls_vclstruct-spras      = 'D'.                                      "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-vclname    = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'.                        "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-object     = 'V_T028Y_SEPA'.                           "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-objecttext = 'Mandatstatus ndern'.                    "#EC NOTEXT
  APPEND ls_vclstruct TO lt_vclstruct.

  CLEAR ls_vclstruct.
  ls_vclstruct-spras      = 'D'.                                      "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-vclname    = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'.                        "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-object     = 'V_T028Z'.                                "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-objecttext = 'Geffnete Posten ndern'.                "#EC NOTEXT
  APPEND ls_vclstruct TO lt_vclstruct.


  CALL METHOD lcl_wb=>create_table_entries "#EC *
    EXPORTING
      i_logical_object = 'X'
      i_tabname  = 'VCLSTRUCT'
      it_entries = lt_vclstruct.

  CLEAR lt_vclstruct[].

  CLEAR ls_vclstruct.
  ls_vclstruct-spras      = 'E'.                                      "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-vclname    = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'.                        "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-object     = 'V_T028X'.                                "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-objecttext = 'Assign Internal Return Reasons to External'. "#EC NOTEXT
  APPEND ls_vclstruct TO lt_vclstruct.

  CLEAR ls_vclstruct.
  ls_vclstruct-spras      = 'E'.                                      "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-vclname    = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'.                        "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-object     = 'V_T028Y'.                                "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-objecttext = 'Return Activities'.                      "#EC NOTEXT
  APPEND ls_vclstruct TO lt_vclstruct.

  CLEAR ls_vclstruct.
  ls_vclstruct-spras      = 'E'.                                      "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-vclname    = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'.                        "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-object     = 'V_T028Y_SEPA'.                           "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-objecttext = 'Change Mandate Status'.                  "#EC NOTEXT
  APPEND ls_vclstruct TO lt_vclstruct.

  CLEAR ls_vclstruct.
  ls_vclstruct-spras      = 'E'.                                      "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-vclname    = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'.                        "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-object     = 'V_T028Z'.                                "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstruct-objecttext = 'Change Open Items'.                      "#EC NOTEXT
  APPEND ls_vclstruct TO lt_vclstruct.


  CALL METHOD lcl_wb=>create_table_entries "#EC *
    EXPORTING
      i_logical_object = 'X'
      i_tabname  = 'VCLSTRUCT'
      it_entries = lt_vclstruct.

  DATA: lt_vclstrudep TYPE TABLE OF vclstrudep, ls_vclstrudep TYPE vclstrudep.

  CLEAR ls_vclstrudep.
  ls_vclstrudep-vclname    = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'.                       "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstrudep-object     = 'V_T028X'.                               "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstrudep-predobject = 'V_T028X'.                               "#EC NOTEXT
  APPEND ls_vclstrudep TO lt_vclstrudep.

  CLEAR ls_vclstrudep.
  ls_vclstrudep-vclname    = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'.                       "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstrudep-object     = 'V_T028Y'.                               "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstrudep-predobject = 'V_T028Y'.                               "#EC NOTEXT
  APPEND ls_vclstrudep TO lt_vclstrudep.

  CLEAR ls_vclstrudep.
  ls_vclstrudep-vclname    = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'.                       "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstrudep-object     = 'V_T028Y_SEPA'.                          "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstrudep-objfield   = 'RRINT'.                                 "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstrudep-predobject = 'V_T028Y'.                               "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstrudep-predfield  = 'RRINT'.                                 "#EC NOTEXT
  APPEND ls_vclstrudep TO lt_vclstrudep.

  CLEAR ls_vclstrudep.
  ls_vclstrudep-vclname    = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'.                       "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstrudep-object     = 'V_T028Z'.                               "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstrudep-objfield   = 'RRINT'.                                 "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstrudep-predobject = 'V_T028Y'.                               "#EC NOTEXT
  ls_vclstrudep-predfield  = 'RRINT'.                                 "#EC NOTEXT
  APPEND ls_vclstrudep TO lt_vclstrudep.


  CALL METHOD lcl_wb=>create_table_entries "#EC *
    EXPORTING
      i_logical_object = 'X'
      i_tabname  = 'VCLSTRUDEP'
      it_entries = lt_vclstrudep.

  ENDIF.
"------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
"- Changes which might be part of manual instruction ---------------------- Not supported Objects
"------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  " VCLS VC_FIEB_RETURNS

"-- R3TR TOBJ VC_FIEB_RETURNSC (language: DE , source: E17 )

  ENDIF.

  CALL METHOD lcl_wb=>activate.

  IF genview IS NOT INITIAL OR testrun IS NOT INITIAL.
    "Call SE54 and generate without changing the screens
    CALL METHOD lcl_wb=>generate_maint_view  "#EC *
      EXPORTING
        i_devclass    = 'FIN_SEPA_EN'
        i_objectname  = 'V_T028Y_SEPA'
        i_objecttype  = 'V'
        i_masterlang  = 'E'
        i_auth_group  = 'FC02'
        i_func_group  = 'SEPA_MNDID_CUST'
        i_dynp_list   = '0006'
        i_dynp_detail = '0000'.

    CALL METHOD lcl_wb=>generate_maint_view  "#EC *
      EXPORTING
        i_devclass    = 'FTE'
        i_objectname  = 'VC_FIEB_RETURNS'
        i_objecttype  = 'C'
        i_masterlang  = 'D'
        i_auth_group  = ''
        i_func_group  = ''
        i_dynp_list   = '0000'
        i_dynp_detail = '0000'.

  ENDIF.

  CALL METHOD lcl_wb=>display_log.
ENDFORM.
